chatbot.initial_bot_text: Hello! This is RoboShop customer support. How can I help you?
chatbot.answer_delivery_robot: Delivery robots autonomously deliver food/items indoors and outdoors. They're commonly used in stores, hospitals, and campuses.
chatbot.answer_cleaning_robot: Cleaning robots automate floor cleaning (vacuum/mopping) and even commercial space cleaning. The best choice depends on area size and floor material.
chatbot.answer_smart_home_robot: Smart home robots control IoT devices (lights/appliances/security) and can act as voice assistants. Hub compatibility and integration range are key.
chatbot.answer_entertainment_robot: Entertainment robots provide fun through conversation, reactions, and content playback. They're popular for kidsâ€™ learning, exhibitions, and home companions.
chatbot.answer_logistics_robot: Logistics robots automate moving/picking/transporting goods in warehouses and factories. Routes, payload capacity, and navigation method matter most.
chatbot.answer_medical_robot: Medical robots support hospital tasks such as transporting supplies, assisting care, and rehabilitation. Safety and operational scenarios are crucial.
chatbot.answer_drone_robot: Drone robots perform aerial tasks like filming, inspection, patrol, and agricultural spraying. Flight time and sensor/camera setup are key factors.
chatbot.answer_service_robot: Service robots help customer-facing tasks like guidance, serving, and mobility support in stores, hotels, and facilities. Layout and interaction style are important.
chatbot.answer_humanoid: Humanoids are human-shaped robots capable of walking, arm movements, and interaction. They're used for research, exhibitions, and service demos.
chatbot.answer_pet_care_robot: Pet care robots support monitoring, treats/play, and remote interaction with pets. Compare mainly by camera, auto-feeding, and interaction features.
chatbot.answer_agriculture_robot: Agriculture robots automate tasks like spraying, harvesting, and transport. The right model depends on crops and environment (greenhouse vs open field).
chatbot.answer_education_robot: Education robots are used for coding/maker/STEAM learning. Age-appropriate difficulty and curriculum support are important.
chatbot.answer_security_robot: Security robots patrol and monitor indoors/outdoors and detect anomalies. Night operation (thermal/IR) and driving stability are key points.
chatbot.answer_companion_robot: Companion robots focus on conversation, emotional expression, and bonding. Interaction quality and the content/dialog experience are the main criteria.
chatbot.fallback_category: I'll guide you through robots related to {{category}}. Selection points vary depending on features and functions.
chatbot.shipping_answer: Shipping usually takes about 2â€“3 days after ordering. Some regions may take longer. Free shipping applies to orders over 500,000 KRW.
chatbot.recommend_prompt: Please choose the type of robot you want.
chatbot.payment_answer: We support credit cards, debit cards, bank transfer, and virtual account deposit. Up to 12-month interest-free installments are also available.
chatbot.return_exchange_answer: Returns/exchanges are available within 7 days of receiving the product. However, returns may be restricted if there are signs of use or the packaging is damaged.
chatbot.price_discount_answer: We currently offer a 10% discount for new members on all products! You can check detailed pricing on each product page.
chatbot.greeting_answer: Hello! I'm the RoboShop support bot. How can I help you?
chatbot.thanks_answer: You're welcome! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask anytime. ðŸ˜Š
